Plot: A middle-aged couple's career and marriage are overturned when a disarming young couple enters their lives.
Title: While We're Young
Actors: Naomi Watts, Ben Stiller, Maria Dizzia, Adam Horovitz
tomatoConsensus: Poignant and piercingly honest, While We're Young finds writer-director Noah Baumbach delivering some of his funniest lines through some of his most relatable characters.
